: : Darkangel : :
Darkangel returns to the Tripredacus base, and stores the pod, as he recieves Tyrael's message.
Darkangel: Understood, I'll man the base. Darkangel out.
 "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:On the Tripredacus ship, the computer detects the entrying ship.

Computer: All units, incoming ship. All units, incoming ship.

Tyrael had barely dropped the pod that he heard the computer's report.

Tyrael: Computer, locate ship. What's the position?

Computer: The ship is located northeast of the Predacon base.

Tyrael: You hear that Kaiser? Cancel my last order, we're going to
recuperate that spacecraft! (He opens a line with Darkangel)
Darkangel, Kaiser and I are going after a newcoming ship. The base is
yours to hold.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "hugar_twriker <hugar_twriker@y...>"
<hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
> OOC:
> If anything is wrong with this post tell me and I will fix it as soon 
> as possible.  If the names are no good tell me.
> 
> 
> BIC:
> �Prometheus�      �Epimetheus�
> 
> 
>      A space shuttle that holds two slowly creaks through space as it 
> heads to the blue and green planet known to its future residents as 
> Earth.  The shuttle looks something like a Bident but instead of two 
> pokers it has two lightning bolts.  It is a metallic silver/white 
> color.
>   
>      But enough of the space shuttle, inside the unique spaceship 
> were two individuals.  They were both silver metallic.  Over their 
> metallic though was more metallic but this is where the two 
> individuals looked different.  One was a shinny red metallic and the 
> other was a shinny blue metallic.  So for now they shall be known as 
> Red and Blue.  Red was studying a map of the world known as Earth.  
> Blue was sitting in the pilot's chair but instead of carefully 
> planning the course he had his legs up on the controls and was 
> twiddinling his thumbs.
> 
>      "Hey Brother," Red said as he turned and faced his 
> comrade, "What the Grease Bolting are you doing!  Why aren't you 
> planning our landing!  I don't want to crash.  Plan ahead."
> 
>       "Plan Ahead?  Yeah right!"  Blue said as he let out a small 
> chuckle, "You are suppose to move with the flow."
> 
>       "We need a landing vector!"  Red yells.
> 
>       "YOU NEED a tic-tack!"  Blue yells back.
> 
>       Poor Poor Blue, if only he listen to his brother.  But he 
> decided to not listen to his brother and decided to go with the 
> flow.  Well now they are flowing on the mountains of the Northern 
> Continent where they crashed.  Their exact location of the crash is 
> (using the map on the events page) as far east of the Predacon base 
> as possible and about an inch up.  It looks like these two bots need 
> a rescue operation. (Hint:  I just making the rescue operation to see 
> which groups are active and that is how I am going to decide who to 
> join to rescue me.)  (So Bots, move out.)
